com.github.wuic.context

Interface ContextInterceptor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContextInterceptorAdapter

    public interface ContextInterceptor

    Represents an interceptor that is called just before and just after a workflow is processed. This gives a last chance to modify input and output of several services. For instance, an interceptor could intercept an EngineRequest the Context is going to use and the list of nuts it returns when the job is done.

    Since:
    0.5.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Guillaume DROUET
